caption.p: Percentage of the hatched eggs of C. elegans treated with extracts of C. alnifolia. The x-axis corresponds to the treatments with ethanol (EE) and water extract (WE) at 0 mg/mL (control), 1 mg/mL, and 10 mg/mL. The y-axis corresponds to the percentage egg hatching. Data were obtained in quintuplicate, and they were analysed by an ANOVA and Tukey's test with significance set at p ≤ 0.05.
